original_title: PFL Regular Season 2021 - PFL 5: MacDonald vs. Tibau
overview: The PFL 5 mixed martial arts event for the 2021 season of the Professional Fighters League was held on June 17, 2021. This was the second regular season event of the tournament and included fights in the Welterweight and Light heavyweight divisions. The event was headlined by a welterweight clash between the former UFC title contender and Bellator welterweight champion Rory MacDonald and the former UFC veteran Gleison Tibau.
title: PFL Regular Season 2021 - PFL 5: MacDonald vs. Tibau
